name: Voids Adrift
storyline:
You Open your eyes, The only thing in sight is a few faintly glowing void shards with metals floating around them. Using a torch to scavenge up some metals near the closest shard, you craft components to make a basic ship, You feel marooned with nobody insight you want to meet other travelers but not get beat to death by others looking for resources too. Friendly creatures greet you at the first island you manage to fly ashore. Impressive ships chug along nearby like steam trains in the sky, billowing massive clouds of steam.  
 
There are few who want to kill you for your materials and a few who want a world to explore. The people you meet are named the Fwaran, talk of the dangerous Bransellian living in the desert, cursing their name, and eye you cautiously to see your response.  
 
They murmur about traveling to the snow obtain the tools they need to win the 1000 year war. You can see dozens of players roaming about and the world feels like it's breathing. while in the silence you often hear distant explosions you often think there's something to be found, but as they get closer you wish you are not the one who the travelers are looking for. As you stare back at your ship, you wonder if it's time for an upgrade to a new design, or if you should slap on a few more engines maybe even give it a name. The World opens up the skies clear, The engine starts.... Your Adventure Begins
summary:
Voids Adrift® is a Player Crafted Multiplayer, 
 
You start in the Void Salvaging Ships from Sunken lost ships and build your way into the sky where you live out your days until you get sent back into the void, 
 
You start in the pitch black void. An ashy fog rolls about you. The only thing in sight are a few faintly glowing void shards with metals floating around them. Using a torch to scavenge up some metals near the closest shard, you craft components to make a basic raft and float up out of the darkness on your boat. 
 
You see an island and travel there. A group of Dwarves called the Fwaran cautiously greet you. They talk of the dangerous Bransellian living in the desert. They eye you suspiciously. Will you help them? You hear murmurs about travelling to the snow. Apparently the tools they need to win a war are there. What war are they talking about? Impressive steam ships chug along nearby like trains in the sky, billowing massive clouds. As you stare back at your dinghy, you wonder if it's time for an upgrade to a new frame, or if you should just slap on a few more engines and get going. 
 
Voids Adrift includes a skill tree of various fighting styles, with gun-play, sword, and bombardier as unique play-styles. 
 
You can see dozens of players roaming about and the world feels like it's breathing. Shots pop off back and forth in the distance. 
 
Build on the Seas, Clouds, Sky and Islands. 
 
Choose your destiny!
